attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: He and his supporters are liars and traitors.  They are selling the British public down the river.  We should have been given the referendum on whether the New European Treaty should be signed or not.  Instead the so-called Prime Minister is bowing meakly to the New UNITED STATES OF EUROPE!  We are losing the 'GREAT' in Great Brittain!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
